name: Less is More (sh1ft15)
description:
This game was supposed to be a submission for a jam but I underestimated the time limit and couldn't finish it off on time. The theme is 'Less is More', I spent like 2-3 days coming up with idea and this's what I ended up with.

If you haven't notice already the game is unfinish and I don't want it to just to stay in my disk without showing it off somehow. Sorry about the bug if you ever encountered once.
